summary: ONLY FOR MALE!! makes them looks like female khajiits.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#ffff00][size=5]DESCRIPTION[/size][/color][/b]

This mod adds Bochu(means "girlish") Khajiit, a new race for male, that looks like female khajiit. 

supports body slider, any khajiit retexture and body-related stuffs, also Pretty Khajiit for MALE one of this race!

female one of this race doesn't have been modified much from vanilla khajiit, so let her rest and just play as male.




*

first time you choose this race, your game may not load additional eyes & lip type properly.

don't blame me! just end your character editing and press `, type "SHOWRACEMENU" without " " will show you character editor again, and things.

*

when your eye is odd, choose EYE COLOR of the front stuffs, not later.  cause there are both male's and female's eyes for male character of Bochu Khajiit.



------------------------------------------------------------------------

[b][color=#ffff00][size=5]REQUIRES[/size][/color][/b]

[size=5]
*  

[color=#ff7700]RaceCompatibility for Skyrim and Dawnguard [/color][/size]

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24168/?





[size=5]*

[color=#ff7700]Pretty Khajiit[/color][/size]

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17040


(optional but strongly recommended, not contained in my mod)



--------------------------------------------------------------------------




COMPATIBILITY


this mod uses [color=#ffff00]Custom Races[/color] http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8720/?


so can't be used with other mods proofing Custom Races mod.

to combine them, you should find tes5edit tutorial for merging esps. there are plenty of tutorials in Youtube.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------


PERMISSIONS 


do whatever you want, I don't care at all and you don't have to inform me of your usage.

and no more patch will be proceeded by me, perhaps.

hope you guys have good time with these humble stuffs.
author: goldiocks
